description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the security vulnerability associated with CVE-2024-11114 in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based):

1. Ensure you are using the latest version of Microsoft Edge.
2. Update your Microsoft Edge browser to version 131.0.2903.48 or higher, which resolves the vulnerability.

**Details**:
This update addresses an inappropriate implementation in views within Google Chrome, which could allow a remote attacker to perform a sandbox escape. The latest version of Microsoft Edge incorporates the necessary updates from Chromium to safeguard against this vulnerability. 

To verify the current version of your Microsoft Edge browser, click on the three dots at the top right, navigate to 'Help and Feedback', then select 'About Microsoft Edge'. The browser will display its current version. 

**Preconditions**:
- Make sure Microsoft Edge is installed on your system.
- Backup any critical data before performing updates. 

Update package URL: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-11114.
